sn35.132:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma mahakaccano avantisu viharati makkarakate arannakutikayam.
sn35.132:1.2: Atha kho lohiccassa brahmanassa sambahula antevasika katthaharaka manavaka yenayasmato mahakaccanassa arannakutika tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva parito parito kutikaya anucankamanti anuvicaranti uccasadda mahasadda kanici kanici seleyyakani karonti:
sn35.132:1.3: “ime pana mundaka samanaka ibbha kanha bandhupadapacca, imesam bharatakanam sakkata garukata manita pujita apacita”ti.
sn35.132:1.4: Atha kho ayasma mahakaccano vihara nikkhamitva te manavake etadavoca:
sn35.132:1.7: Evam vutte, te manavaka tunhi ahesum.
sn35.132:1.8: Atha kho ayasma mahakaccano te manavake gathahi ajjhabhasi:
sn35.132:3.1: Dhamme ca jhane ca rata ahesum,
sn35.132:8.1: Atha kho te manavaka kupita anattamana yena lohicco brahmano tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva lohiccam brahmanam etadavocum:
sn35.132:8.2: “yagghe bhavam janeyya, samano mahakaccano brahmananam mante ekamsena apavadati, patikkosati”ti?
sn35.132:8.3: Evam vutte, lohicco brahmano kupito ahosi anattamano.
sn35.132:8.5: “na kho pana metam patirupam yoham annadatthu manavakanamyeva sutva samanam mahakaccanam akkoseyyam paribhaseyyam.
sn35.132:9.1: Atha kho lohicco brahmano tehi manavakehi saddhim yenayasma mahakaccano tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmata mahakaccanena saddhim sammodi.
sn35.132:9.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho lohicco brahmano ayasmantam mahakaccanam etadavoca:
sn35.132:9.3: “agamamsu nu khvidha, bho kaccana, amhakam sambahula antevasika katthaharaka manavaka”ti?
sn35.132:9.4: “Agamamsu khvidha te, brahmana, sambahula antevasika katthaharaka manavaka”ti.
sn35.132:9.5: “Ahu pana bhoto kaccanassa tehi manavakehi saddhim kocideva kathasallapo”ti?
sn35.132:9.6: “Ahu kho me, brahmana, tehi manavakehi saddhim kocideva kathasallapo”ti.
sn35.132:9.7: “Yatha katham pana bhoto kaccanassa tehi manavakehi saddhim ahosi kathasallapo”ti?
sn35.132:9.8: “Evam kho me, brahmana, tehi manavakehi saddhim ahosi kathasallapo:
sn35.132:11.1: Evam kho me, brahmana, tehi manavakehi saddhim ahosi kathasallapo”ti.
sn35.132:12.2: Kittavata nu kho, bho kaccana, aguttadvaro hoti”ti?
sn35.132:12.3: “Idha, brahmana, ekacco cakkhuna rupam disva piyarupe rupe adhimuccati, appiyarupe rupe byapajjati, anupatthitakayassati ca viharati, parittacetaso
sn35.132:12.4: tanca cetovimuttim pannavimuttim yathabhutam nappajanati yatthassa te uppanna papaka akusala dhamma aparisesa nirujjhanti.
sn35.132:12.9: manasa dhammam vinnaya piyarupe dhamme adhimuccati, appiyarupe ca dhamme byapajjati, anupatthitakayassati ca viharati, parittacetaso
sn35.132:12.10: tanca cetovimuttim pannavimuttim yathabhutam nappajanati yatthassa te uppanna papaka akusala dhamma aparisesa nirujjhanti.
sn35.132:12.13: Yavancidam bhota kaccanena aguttadvarova samano aguttadvaroti akkhato.
sn35.132:13.2: Kittavata nu kho, bho kaccana, guttadvaro hoti”ti?
sn35.132:13.3: “Idha, brahmana, bhikkhu cakkhuna rupam disva piyarupe rupe nadhimuccati, appiyarupe rupe na byapajjati, upatthitakayassati ca viharati, appamanacetaso
sn35.132:13.4: tanca cetovimuttim pannavimuttim yathabhutam pajanati yatthassa te uppanna papaka akusala dhamma aparisesa nirujjhanti.
sn35.132:13.9: manasa dhammam vinnaya piyarupe dhamme nadhimuccati, appiyarupe dhamme na byapajjati, upatthitakayassati ca viharati, appamanacetaso
sn35.132:13.10: tanca cetovimuttim pannavimuttim yathabhutam pajanati, yatthassa te uppanna papaka akusala dhamma aparisesa nirujjhanti.
sn35.132:14.2: Yavancidam bhota kaccanena guttadvarova samano guttadvaroti akkhato.
sn35.132:14.3: Abhikkantam, bho kaccana; abhikkantam, bho kaccana.
sn35.132:14.4: Seyyathapi, bho kaccana, nikkujjitam va ukkujjeyya, paticchannam va vivareyya, mulhassa va maggam acikkheyya, andhakare va telapajjotam dhareyya: ‘cakkhumanto rupani dakkhanti’ti; evamevam bhota kaccanena anekapariyayena dhammo pakasito.
sn35.132:14.5: Esaham, bho kaccana, tam bhagavantam saranam gacchami, dhammanca, bhikkhusanghanca.
sn35.132:14.6: Upasakam mam bhavam kaccano dharetu ajjatagge panupetam saranam gatam.
sn35.132:14.7: Yatha ca bhavam kaccano makkarakate upasakakulani upasankamati; evameva lohiccakulam upasankamatu.
sn35.132:14.8: Tattha ye manavaka va manavika va bhavantam kaccanam abhivadessanti paccutthissanti asanam va udakam va dassanti, tesam tam bhavissati digharattam hitaya sukhaya”ti.
